name: Shump Dungeon
description:
What if you want a dungeon crawler and shoot em up game in one? 

Shump Dungeon is a short dungeon crawler game where you discover various monsters in dungeons.  Once you encounter into a monster, you are sent into battle which is a shoot em up style of gameplay.  Avoid various hazards and don't die...

Monster Concept Art by Chez

Credit: 

Chez - Concept Art, Monster Designs - https://twitter.com/ChezForShire

Fred EP - Music Composer - fredep.com   https://twitter.com/TwistwonkaE

Squid Maker - Game Desing, Level Design -  https://twitter.com/PixelSquid_

Controls:

Dungeon -

Move (left or right or up or down) -  Arrow keys. 

Use Stairs - Spacebar

In  battle -

Move (left or right) -  Arrow keys. 

Shoot - Spacebar

Main character Concept Art by Chez

This game was made for the GBjam 8. Very happy with out come of this game and learnt a lot of new game desing and general skills from this one week jam. A big appreciation towards Chez for various concept art and Fred EP for making various music tracks for the game. 

I hope you all enjoy Shump Dungeon!
